plugins.name: Ethos
plugins.description:
Ethos offers a top-notch brand asset management software solution and tools to streamline and organize your digital assets effortlessly.

- Create and share your own custom brand showrooms as an interactive website and pdf, and showcase and maintain your branding best practices.

- Share your official brand copy, brand logos, brand colors, brand fonts, brand rules and custom brand sections.

- Deploy your brand voice and image correctly to activate your powerful brand position.

- Improve your existing brand copy to bring it to the next level with artificial intelligence.

- Make your brand more authentic and cohesive by generating expanded primary, secondary and monotone color palettes.

- Invite your team and clients to your official brand spaces, and enable collaboration on one or more brands at a time.


For any questions or feedback, feel free to ping us at team@yourethos.io

accepted.name: Ethos
accepted.description: Build, share, and grow your iconic brand with our complete AI-powered creative brand showroom. Visit https://www.yourethos.io/ for more. Free Figma widget.

plugins.tagline: Brand Asset Management Software Solution

plugins.name: ComponentFiller AI
plugins.description:
ComponentFiller は生成AIを用いて、選択したフレームの原稿と、人間が用意したコンポーネントのコードを組み合わせ、コンポーネントに適切な原稿を入力したコードを返します（要APIキー／Gemini のAPIは無料で取得できます）


利用方法

  1. 利用するAIのAPIを選択
  2. APIキーを入力
  3. 利用する言語と、言語に合わせた基本のプロンプトを設定（任意）
  4. ベースとなるコンポーネントのコードを入力
  5. 利用したいフレームを選択
  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---


ComponentFiller uses generation AI to combine the script for the selected frame with the component code prepared by humans, and returns a code with the appropriate script entered into the component (API key required).


How to use

  1. Select the AI ​​API to use
  2. Enter the API key
  3. Set the language to use and the basic prompt for the language (optional)
  4. Enter the base component code
  5. Select the frame you want to use
  6. Generate code


Please note: Your data will be sent to the AI ​​service of your choice to generate the code.
plugins.tagline: Insert the text from the design data into your code

  6. コードを生成


注意事項：コードを生成するために、選択したAIサービスにデータが送信されます


---

plugins.name: Find Elements
plugins.description:
Using this tool, we can find any Text Nodes having phrase 'Lorem' i.e. dummy text across the entire page. Then we can find any Text Nodes which do not match the font parameters i.e. Font Family, Style and Size. Finally, we can also find all nodes not matching the color given in hex values.

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.
plugins.tagline: Find text having 'Lorem', find text with non-matching font and find items with non-matching colors

This is tool is helpful to find mis-matched items based on the given parameters.

plugins.name: Background Manager
plugins.description:
Background Manager makes it easy to switch your Figma canvas background between light, dark, or any custom color — instantly.


Use presets, apply hex values, or pick your own color with a live preview. Includes an optional "close after apply" toggle and resizable window for a smooth, focused workflow.


Built for designers who care about context, mood, and file readability.


  1. Light, Dark, and Custom background modes
  2. Color picker + hex input
  3. Auto-syncs to your current canvas background
  4. "Close after applying" option
  5. Minimal, Figma-native UI
plugins.tagline: Quickly switch or customize your canvas background without breaking flow.

plugins.name: prompt2canvas
plugins.description:
prompt2canvas brings powerful AI image generation directly into Figma. Use top models like Flux, SDXL, Imagen, and more—without leaving your design canvas.


Easily customize each model’s settings through a clean and intuitive interface, tailor prompts to your needs, and generate stunning visuals in seconds.


To use the plugin, you’ll need an API key from Replicate, which gives you access to a wide range of state-of-the-art AI models.
plugins.tagline: The power of top AI models, seamlessly integrated into your design workflow.

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

plugins.name: Smart Text Styler
plugins.description:
# Smart Text Styler


Smart Text Styler is a Figma plugin that allows you to highlight specific words and phrases with custom styles — apply colors and bold styling easily.



## Features (Free version)

✅ Highlight a single keyword (per run)

✅ Apply custom color

✅ Optionally apply bold styling

✅ Works across all TEXT nodes in the current page


## Coming in Pro version

🚀 Support multiple keywords (comma separated)

🚀 Cross-page processing

🚀 Italic / underline options

🚀 Save style presets


## How to use

1. Run the plugin from Figma Plugins menu

2. Enter the keyword you want to highlight

3. Enter the desired highlight color (HEX)

4. (Optional) Check "Apply Bold" to apply bold style

5. Click `Run` — done!


## Support

For feature requests / Pro version inquiries, contact me at shengni.zhang@qq.com.

designer personal website: www.shengni.org
plugins.tagline: Find, highlight(change color) and bold your text.

plugins.name: Variety corner
plugins.description:
矩形多样圆角

多种样式: 提供切角（倒角）、内直角（挤压）、内弧角（凹陷）等多种预设。

完全可控: 不仅能独立控制四个角的半径，还能通过滑块精细调整“内直角”和“内弧角”的凹陷程度。


Rectangle Variety Corner

Multiple Styles: Provides presets like Angle (Chamfer), Inner Right (Inset), and Inner Arc (Concave).

Full Control: Not only can you control the radius of each corner independently, but you can also fine-tune the inset depth for Inner Right and Inner Arc styles with a dedicated slider.
plugins.tagline: 提供三种圆角样式 Provide extended corner styles

136860.name: Variety corner
136860.description:
矩形多样圆角

多种样式: 提供切角（倒角）、内直角（挤压）、内弧角（凹陷）等多种预设。

完全可控: 不仅能独立控制四个角的半径，还能通过滑块精细调整“内直角”和“内弧角”的凹陷程度。


Rectangle Variety Corner

Multiple Styles: Provides presets like Angle (Chamfer), Inner Right (Inset), and Inner Arc (Concave).

Full Control: Not only can you control the radius of each corner independently, but you can also fine-tune the inset depth for Inner Right and Inner Arc styles with a dedicated slider.
136860.release_notes:
插件现在会保留图层样式(填充 描边 效果)，除了pattern！我不知道为什么总之pattern会导致填充消失，如果一定要用到pattern，请在最后添加，或者先ctrl alt c复制图层属性，修改倒角完毕后ctrl alt v黏贴。
The plugin will now preserve layer styles (Fill, Stroke, Effects), except for Patterns! Unfortunately, I don't know why, but patterns cause the Fill to disappear. If you absolutely must use a pattern, add it last, or first press Ctrl+Alt+C to copy the layer's properties, edit the bevel (or make your other changes), and then press Ctrl+Alt+V to paste them back.
136860.tagline: 提供三种圆角样式 Provide extended corner styles

plugins.name: Markdown Import
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---


This plugin lets you import markdown-style text into your Figma page directly from Google Docs, Notepad, or any markdown editor.


It automatically parses the structure of your content—such as # Heading 1, ## Heading 2, ### Heading 3, and body text —and allows you to assign custom components for each section during import.


【Key Features】

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component
plugins.tagline: マークダウンのテキストをコンポーネントを適用してインポート | Import markdown into Figma with component mapping.

135867.name: Markdown Import
135867.description:
このプラグインは、Google Docsやメモ帳などからコピーしたマークダウン形式のテキストを、Figmaのページ内にインポートするツールです。

「# 見出し1 」「 ## 見出し2」「### 見出し3」「本文」の構造を自動で判別し、それぞれに対応するコンポーネントを選択して挿入することができます。


【主な機能】

  1. マークダウン記法でコピー＆ペースト → 自動でレイアウト生成
  2. 見出し1〜3、本文、それぞれに同一ページ内の任意のコンポーネントを割り当て可能
  3. コンポーネント内のテキストレイヤーを自動で認識し、文字を置換


---

  1. Paste markdown-formatted text and auto-generate layout in Figma
  2. Assign your preferred components for headings (H1–H3) and body text
  3. Detect and replace text inside the designated layer of each component

plugins.name: Human Design Map Builder
plugins.description:
This plugin is part of a structured system for generating personalized Human Design maps inside Figma.

It reads structured data from a frame called INPUT_PANEL and dynamically updates the cover, highlights centers, colors gates, and reveals matching sections based on the data.

It ends by copying all relevant sections to a target page (מפות מעודכנות) for final output.

No data is sent to external services, except for a success/failure status posted to a webhook for internal workflow tracking.

This plugin is tailored for a specific document structure and may not function properly outside that context.
plugins.tagline: Automatically build and assemble custom sections inside your Figma based on predefined data fields.

plugins.name: Variable Remapper
plugins.description:
OVERVIEW


The Variable Remapper is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline design system management by enabling seamless migration and remapping of variables between different libraries and collections. This tool is essential for teams managing complex design systems, migrating between libraries, or consolidating variable usage across projects.


CORE CAPABILITIES


Variable Remapping

The plugin provides comprehensive bulk variable migration capabilities, automatically remapping variables from one library to another across entire design systems. The intelligent name matching system matches variables between source and target libraries based on name similarity, reducing manual configuration requirements.

Users can exercise precise scope control by choosing to remap variables across selected objects only, the current page, or all pages in the document. Additionally, collection-specific remapping allows filtering to specific variable collections for granular control over migration processes.


Variable Analysis and Mapping

The system offers comprehensive variable listing functionality to scan and catalog all variable bindings throughout designs. The detailed view presents every variable binding with complete contextual information, including node names and types, bound properties such as fills, strokes, effects, and dimensions, current variable names and sources, plus complete library and collection information.

The grouped view consolidates similar variable bindings for streamlined bulk management operations, while the interactive mapping table enables manual specification of target variables for precise control over remapping processes.


Library Management

The plugin provides robust multi-library support, working seamlessly with local variables in current files, team library variables, and remote libraries. Automatic library detection identifies variable sources and displays comprehensive library information throughout the interface.

Users can browse through variable collections with detailed counts and metadata, supported by real-time loading of library collections and variables for immediate access to current information.


KEY FEATURES


Precision Control

The plugin supports comprehensive property-level binding across all Figma variable binding types, including color variables for fills and strokes, dimension variables for width, height, corner radius, and stroke weight, effect variables for opacity, rotation, and positioning, and boolean variables for visibility controls.

Advanced array property support handles complex bindings such as multiple fills or effects, while safe remapping functionality validates target variables before applying changes to ensure data integrity throughout the migration process.


Advanced Analysis

The binding discovery system automatically identifies all variable bindings across complex node hierarchies, providing complete visibility into variable usage patterns. Source attribution functionality shows exactly where each variable originates, whether from the current file, specific team library names, or remote libraries.

Collection context displays variable collection names for improved organization and understanding of variable relationships throughout the design system.


User Experience

The tabbed interface provides clean separation between remapping and analysis functions, enabling focused workflows for different use cases. Real-time feedback includes loading states, progress indicators, and detailed status messages to keep users informed throughout operations.

Comprehensive error handling delivers actionable feedback when issues arise, while the modern user interface utilizes Figma-native styling with responsive design principles for seamless integration with existing workflows.


USE CASES


Design System Migration

Organizations can migrate from deprecated variable libraries to updated versions, consolidate multiple libraries into a single source of truth, and update variable references when reorganizing design systems. This capability is essential for maintaining consistency during design system evolution and reducing technical debt.


Theme Management

Teams can efficiently switch between light and dark theme variables, apply brand-specific variable sets across different product lines, and test various variable configurations during design exploration phases. This functionality supports rapid iteration and brand consistency maintenance.


Cleanup and Optimization

The plugin enables identification of unused or orphaned variable bindings, standardization of variable usage across teams, and comprehensive auditing of variable implementation across large-scale projects. These capabilities support design system hygiene and optimization efforts.


Workflow Automation

Organizations can batch update variable references during design system updates, streamline handoff processes between design and development teams, and maintain consistency across multiple Figma files. This automation reduces manual work and minimizes human error in variable management processes.
plugins.tagline: Streamline design system by bulk remapping variables across libraries, pages, and components.

plugins.name: Zephyr Export
plugins.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin
plugins.tagline: Figma to defold atlas exporter

135215.description: Exports a section with all its images as an atlas to the Defold engine. Before exporting, it wraps images into frames, all existing frames into components, adds TYPE TYPE_BOX property to all components and sets constraints scale (scale is not set if stretch is set). After that you can use your components in the zephyr plugin

plugins.name: Extractor
plugins.description:
Components as you go.


As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →
plugins.tagline: Components as you go

135192.description:

As you design, systems, patterns, and components naturally emerge. With Extractor, you can select your working frames, instantly extract them to a component, and automatically replace the original selection with a component instance.


This approach lets you focus on the details while future-proofing designs and aligning process more closely with development.


Simply select your frames and access the "Extract Component" command using CMD + P.


Feedback form →

plugins.name: JSON to Variable
plugins.description:
You can import a JSON file to create grouped Figma variables. you can download the pre-structured Tailwind color palette JSON file via the link as a starting point:


Tailwind colors structured.json


The following is an example of a correctly formatted JSON:

[
{
"CollectionName": {
"modes": {
"ModeName": {
"GroupName": {
"Primary": {
"$value": "#FFFFFF",
"$type": "color"
},

"secondary": {
"$value": "#F5F5F5",
"$type": "color"
}
},
"GroupName2": {
"primary": {
"$value": "#2196F3",
"$type": "color"
}
}
}
}
}
}
]
plugins.tagline: Import JSON file to variable

"$type": "color"
}
},
"GroupName2": {

}
}

plugins.name: CSV text replace
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、Figma上のテキストレイヤーをCSVを使って効率的に一括置換・エクスポートできるツールです。

Figmaでのテキスト管理が多いプロジェクトや翻訳ワークフローに最適なプラグインです。


【主な機能】

①テキストの一括置換

CSVファイルにA列＝検索対象、B列＝置換内容を記述し、プラグインに読み込ませるだけで、Figma内の該当テキストを自動的に置き換えます。


②テキストのエクスポート

選択したフレームやテキストレイヤー内の文字列をCSV形式で書き出し。翻訳や編集作業との連携に最適です。


【使い方】

プラグイン起動後、

「リプレイス」タブでCSVファイルをアップロードし置換を実行

「エクスポート」タブでは、選択中のテキストをCSVでダウンロード可能

フレームを選択した状態では、そのフレームに含まれる全てのテキストレイヤーを一括でCSV化してダウンロードします


----


This plugin allows you to bulk replace and export text layers in Figma using CSV files—perfect for efficient content updates and translation workflows.

Highly useful for localization, bulk edits, or working with external editors.


[Key Features]

①Bulk Replace Text

Simply upload a CSV file where column A = target text and column B = replacement text. The plugin will find and replace matching text layers in your Figma file.


②Export Text

Export text content from selected frames or layers into a CSV file. Ideal for translation or review processes.


[How to Use]

Open the plugin and go to the “Replace” tab to upload your CSV and execute replacement.

Use the “Export” tab to download the text from selected layers as a CSV file.

When a frame is selected, all text layers within that frame will be exported together as a CSV file.
plugins.tagline: Replace and export text layers in Figma via CSV. CSVでテキストを一括置換＆エクスポート。

plugins.name: Bangalicon
plugins.description:
🔥 Bangalicon - The First Icon Plugin You Will Ever Need For Figma


Now, with a new Plugin of Bangalicon, you can get more than 500 high-quality SVG icons right in your Figma workflow. Bangalicons' curated collection of beautifully crafted icons spanning interfaces, communication, business, media, and more is at your fingertips now. It has been meticulously designed for speed, flexibility, and pixel perfection.


✨ Key Features:


500+ icons: Scalable and diverse as per the requirement.


Live Preview & Insert: You can browse, search, and without leaving Figma, icons can be inserted seamlessly which saves time.


Category-based filtering: Finding what you want is made easier because of organized categories.


Will Bangalicon work on IOS apps? Yes. Whether it is website designing or mobile marketing visuals, Bangalicon for Figma is guaranteed to raise your level of design visually in an instant.


⚡️ Save time and design better with Bangalicon.
plugins.tagline: The world of most creative icons

plugins.name: World Clock
plugins.description:
Stay in sync with your global team — right inside Figma.

World Clock Plugin lets you add real-time clocks for any city around the world. Just type a city name, select it, and instantly view its current time in a beautifully minimal interface.


Perfect for remote teams, cross-border collabs, and late-night design sprints.
plugins.tagline: Never ask ‘What time is it there?’ again.

plugins.name: Nativ Localization
plugins.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
plugins.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

135216.name: Nativ Localization
135216.description: The Nativ Localization plugin allows you to adapt visual content inside Figma to any culture and language (from any culture or language). This includes context-aware translation of editable text inside visual assets, as well as uneditable text that are part of complex pixel arts. The plugin allows you to upload your own glossary enabling you to control translation styles/tones. The translations automatically maintain the same original style in the target culture/language. The plugin also goes beyond text, such as stylistically replacing country flags in a poster based on the localization target.
135216.release_notes: Added authentication to the Nativ platform
135216.tagline: Transform visual assets to any culture and language.

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

132665.name: Email Name Generator
132665.description:
Easily generate realistic and culturally diverse names right inside Figma. NameGen Africa helps designers and developers populate mockups with random African and global names—perfect for UI/UX projects, user flows, and form demos.


Features:


Generate random names with authentic African and international options

Choose between first name only or first and last name (separated by a period: john.doe)

Select email type: corporate (e.g., john.doe@company.com) or personal (e.g., john.doe@gmail.com)


Instantly fill text fields or use in prototyping workflows


Perfect for creating inclusive and realistic user data with just a few clicks!
132665.tagline: Generate random email names for your project
